title: The Stress mess
creator_credit: Ron Underwood, Mark Chodzko and Barr Films
brief_description: This humorous yet hard hitting film follows the Wilson family - Fred, Stacey and their college student daughter, Karen - through a typical stress filled day. The program teaches the importance of setting priorities, delegating tasks, learning to say “No”, and learning how to relax.
